reference.title: ListPendingActiveNodes
reference.shortdesc: You can use the ListPendingActiveNodes method to list nodes in the cluster that are in the PendingActive state, between pending and active states. Nodes in this state are being returned to the factory image.

section.title: Parameters
section.p: This method has no input parameters.

section.title: Return value
section.p: This method has the following return value:

row.entry: List of objects detailing information about all PendingActive nodes in the system.

section.title: Request example
section.p: Requests for this method are similar to the following example:

section.title: Response example
section.p: This method returns a response similar to the following example:
